data.title: Scarface The World is Yours pc port for pcsx2
data.meta_description:
PAYPAL
status: 5%
Serial: SLUS-21111
CRC: 41F4A178

objective ports testuras in mod hd from pc to ps2 version, note: no end date.
data.meta_site_name: GBAtemp.net - The Independent Video Game Community
data.text:
I'm working on this too we will see who does it better, were you able to open the p3d files from the PS2 ?

Why wouldn't you just work together? Makes no sense to be in competition to do the exact same thing. Peolpe have no need for multiple versions of the same exports and upscaled art assets. Why not message him and ask how you can help?

Why wouldn't you just work together? Makes no sense to be in competition to do the exact same thing. Peolpe have no need for multiple versions of the same exports and upscaled art assets. Why not message him and ask how you can help?

It's my first project, I'm kind of doing two versions one personal where I'm changing stuff on the iso, and texture pack not just porting but hd remake, playing with blood effects as we speak and getting new audio, plan on doing some crazy projects coming up complete new games designed out of old games kind of like Rom hacks on the nes but way more funner

I'm extracting the p3d textures from the hd mod for the pc version

i separated by male and female i figured that be the easiest way to match them up if you want my folder just let me know I'm at vehicles, the vehicles are completely transparent, changing the file will not change the color of the car, you could just update the body at most, but i can't find 3d map files anywhere.

I'm extracting the p3d textures from the hd mod for the pc version

Post automatically merged: May 12, 2024

i been dumping all images, matching them by file name in the iso, then play the game again and texture dump with updated images, almost done on cars, im hoping it works, because that's a fuck load of characters to match by eye, i own a convenience store, i might add me in as one of the business owners maybe the liquor store, lol, and change the character to one that looks like me to
